synopsis: Vote to pass with amendment a bill that establishes the state budget for fiscal year 2020.
name: HB 2753 - Authorizes Environmental State Budget for Fiscal Year 2020 - Arizona Key Vote
pg: Highlights: Specifies that the following amounts from the following sources are appropriated from the state general fund to the water quality assurance revolving fund for fiscal year 2019-2020 (Sec. 10): $2.8 million from the emissions inspection fund; $2.6 million from the air quality fund; $5 million from the underground storage tank revolving fund; $1 million from the permit administration fund; and $2.15 million from the recycling fund. Appropriates an addition $2 million to the water quality assurance revolving fund (Sec. 10). Appropriates $6.53 million to the Department of Environmental Quality (Sec. 8). Appropriates up to $336,000 to the Department of Water Resources (Sec. 7).
